0.5.0.name: wordpress/lazyest-widgets
0.5.0.description:
Lazyest Gallery version 1.1.20 inludes all these widgets. If you use Lazyest Gallery version 1.1.20 or higher, you don't need this plugin.

This plugin adds new widgets to Lazyest Gallery.

included since version 0.6 of this plugin

  • Recent Images Widget
  • Recent Images Slideshow
  • Really Random Image Widget
  • Really Random Image Slideshow Widget
  • Latest Folders Widget
